import Mathlib

/-- Abstract placeholder for the fundamental group of a pointed topological space. -/
axiom pi1 (X : Type _) (x0 : X) : Type _

/-- The fundamental group of a product is (abstractly) equivalent to the product
    of the fundamental groups.  (Statement only; proof omitted.) -/
theorem pi1_prod (X Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] (x0 : X) (y0 : Y) :
  Equiv (pi1 X x0 × pi1 Y y0) (pi1 (X × Y) (x0, y0)) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Abstract placeholder for the fundamental group of a pointed topological space. -/
axiom pi1 (X : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X] (x0 : X) : Type _

/-- The fundamental group of a product is (abstractly) equivalent to the product
    of the fundamental groups.  (Statement only; proof omitted.) -/
theorem pi1_prod (X Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] (x0 : X) (y0 : Y) :
  Equiv (pi1 (X × Y) (x0, y0)) (pi1 X x0 × pi1 Y y0) := by sorry

import Mathlib

universe u

/-- Abstract placeholder for the fundamental group of a pointed topological space. -/
axiom pi1 (X : Type u) [TopologicalSpace X] (x0 : X) : Type u

/-- The fundamental group of a product is (abstractly) equivalent to the product
    of the fundamental groups.  (Statement only; proof omitted.) -/
theorem pi1_prod (X Y : Type u) [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] (x0 : X) (y0 : Y) :
  pi1 (X × Y) (x0, y0) ≃ (pi1 X x0 × pi1 Y y0) := by sorry
